lines.text: It's... good. Okay. Well, I'm gonna zhuzh that up a bit, if you don't mind. Uh... you just focus on... your... thing.
Quality builds reputation. Reputation builds trust. Trust builds... the ability to charge more.
You know what makes a Good Thing good? I don't actually know. But the customers seem happy, so let's not question it.
This is the 'sustainable business model' they talked about in school. Slow, steady, and only mildly anxiety-inducing.
A Good Thing is like a good hot dog: you know it when you taste it. Wait, don't taste me. That came out wrong.
I'm proud of you for choosing the Good path. Your mother would be too. She always said you had good taste.
Look at that reputation! People really love your Good Things. It's like being popular but with spreadsheets.
